0010000010010010 1100010111011110 0 -> sum: 1110011001110000, cout: 0
0011110010010010 1001010010000000 0 -> sum: 1101000100010010, cout: 0
1101010100101101 1000000111110110 0 -> sum: 0101011100100011, cout: 1

0100110110000010 1111010010101110 0 -> sum: 0100001000110000, cout: 1
1000000001001011 1010000001001100 1 -> sum: 0010000010011000, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
